mapper.insert: insert into ecs_validate_record (record_key, record_type, last_send_time, expired_time, create_time, record_code, ext_info) values (#{record_key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{record_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{last_send_time,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{expired_time,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{create_time,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{record_code,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{ext_info,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update ecs_validate_record set record_type = #{record_type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_send_time = #{last_send_time,jdbcType=INTEGER}, expired_time = #{expired_time,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{create_time,jdbcType=INTEGER}, record_code = #{record_code,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, ext_info = #{ext_info,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where record_key = #{record_key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select record_key, record_type, last_send_time, expired_time, create_time, record_code, ext_info from ecs_validate_record where record_key = #{record_key,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select record_key, record_type, last_send_time, expired_time, create_time, record_code, ext_info from ecs_validate_record
